Printing the program help menu:
usage: pytoxo [-h] [--gametes] (--max_prev | --max_her)
              MODEL PREV_OR_HER MAFS [MAFS ...]

PyToxo: A Python library for calculating penetrance tables of any bivariate
epistasis model.

positional arguments:
  MODEL        The path to the epistatic model CSV file.
  PREV_OR_HER  The heritability or prevalence to fix, depending of the used
               flag. Maximizing prevalence, this argument will be interpreted
               as heritability; and maximizing heritability, as prevalence.
  MAFS         The MAFs to use. As many as the order has the model, followed.

optional arguments:
  -h, --help   show this help message and exit
  --gametes    This flag is to use GAMETES format to print the final table,
               instead of default CSV format.
  --max_prev   This flag set PyToxo to maximize the prevalence, so the
               'PREV_OR_HER' argument will be considered as heritability.
  --max_her    This flag set PyToxo to maximize the heritability, so the
               'PREV_OR_HER' argument will be considered as prevalence.

PyToxo CLI. Copyright 2021 Borja GonzÃ¡lez Seoane

Example 1: 'pytoxo models/additive_3.csv 0.2 0.4 0.4 0.4 --max_her':
